Package com.ikalagaming.entity

Classes relating to entities, which are objects in a game.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICurrencyHolder
    An interface for entities that own currency and can perform transactions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Entity
    An entity that can be represented in the game world which has a unique name.
    InventorySlot
    A slot in an inventory that holds an ItemStack.
    Player
    A player in the game which might be controlled by a human.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Resource
    A list of resources that can be owned by an entity or used as a cost for something.

Package com.ikalagaming.entity Description

Classes relating to entities, which are objects in a game. These may be alive and/or playable, or inanimate objects.
